text: Grace Lee Whitney (born Mary Ann Chase; April 1, 1930 - May 1, 2015) was an American actress and entertainer. She was best known as Janice Rand on the Star Trek television series. Whitney died at her home in Coarsegold, California on May 1, 2015 from natural causes, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Grace Lee Whitney Official Autograph site * Janice Rand history * Grace Lee Whitney- Notable Names Database Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:Singers from Michigan Category:People from Ann Arbor, Michigan
title: Grace Lee Whitney
